recipe_name: Coffee and chocolate meringues with chocolate sauce
author: Phil Vickery
method: To make the chocolate sauce mix together all of the ingredients. For the meringues, mix together the ingredients and roll into small balls. Cook in the microwave for two minutes. Serve on a plate drizzled with the chocolate sauce.
